title: how to include my own models into gzweb.

content.raw:
Hi, all!

I'm trying to run the my gazebo model(evarobot) using gzweb.
I could run the launch  roslaunch evarobot_description demo.launch, and I could see an evarobot on gazebo sim but when I start gzweb I can't find the model to insert!

I has been copied evarobot_description directory to http/client/assets folder. 

I know that in order to use custom model on gzweb, local model has to be deployed. So, I executed some commands as follow:
```
source /usr/share/gazebo-4-1/setup.sh
export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=`rospack find evarobot_description`:$GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH
cd /path/to/gzweb* 
./deploy.sh -m local
```
and I see this terminal screen (creating thumbnail for evarobot_description)

![create_evarobot.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/114530118-create_evarobot.png)

Then I executed ./start_gzweb.sh, and could see the ground of gazebo world, but no evarobot has been found.

How should I do next?

Hi, all!

I'm trying to run the my gazebo model(evarobot) using gzweb. I could run the launch roslaunch evarobot_description demo.launch, and I could see an evarobot on gazebo sim but when I start gzweb I can't find the model to insert!

I has been copied evarobot_description directory to http/client/assets folder.

I know that in order to use custom model on gzweb, local model has to be deployed. So, I executed some commands as follow:

source /usr/share/gazebo-4-1/setup.sh
export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=`rospack find evarobot_description`:$GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH
cd /path/to/gzweb* 
./deploy.sh -m local

and I see this terminal screen (creating thumbnail for evarobot_description)

Then I executed ./start_gzweb.sh, and could see the ground of gazebo world, but no evarobot has been found.

How should I do next?
